purpose: Facilitates the integration of AI-driven automation and actions into enterprise systems and applications.
principle: Built on Python, leveraging modular components to interface with various enterprise systems, allowing for streamlined automation.
reusability: Offers a modular architecture with Python libraries that can be integrated into existing systems, supports API-based interactions for extensibility.
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, may have limited support for complex enterprise environments, documentation might be evolving.
